original_title: ハックルベリー・フィン物語
overview: We begin our adventure by the banks of the Mississippi River, where we see life through the eyes of a young boy named Huck Finn. Huck is a resourceful and spirited lad who knows how to survive on his own. He flees his father, and travels with Jim, a runaway, from whom he learns about life.  Tom Sawyer is a mischievous, adventure-hungry boy who has a zest for life. He is a true romantic at heart, but not above a little trickery to get his way... or to get out of work.  Tom's life really becomes interesting when he meets Huck. Together with Jim, they begin a series of adventures. Based on the novels by Mark Twain, "Huck and Tom's Mississippi Adventures" stands as a timeless story filled with excitement, action, and universal lessons that appeal to all ages.
title: Huck & Tom's Mississippi Adventure
